title: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft command, the text does not move as expected.
EB: When executing the ShiftLeft command, the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab). If there is a stray space, it should be removed. The text should move accordingly.
SR:
1. Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that the two lines are indented the same visually.
2. Execute the ShiftLeft command and observe the movement of the text.
